h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong
content: Red Loong will use its electricity imbued attacks to wreak havoc on you, but can also perform a variety of powerful melee attacks. Be wary of his ability to fly over to you and slash at you as he pivots.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Red Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Red Loong will use its electricity imbued attacks to wreak havoc on you, but can also perform a variety of powerful melee attacks. Be wary of his ability to fly over to you and slash at you as he pivots.
